desc: Shop for ethically sourced authentic Turkish Towels for Beach, Bath and more. Free Shipping over $75 in USA. Our Turkish towels are hand loomed with 100% Turkish cotton in old looming machines in small batches. We are a women owned fair trade company locates in Ohio. Every purchase gives back to women's education.

layout.text: TURKISH BATH TOWELS FOR YOUR HOME
ECO FRIENDLY ETHICALLY PRODUCED TURKISH TOWELS

Azo Free certified Handloomed Turkish towels
After all your home is your sanctuary.
